 Magnus got hit in the leg by one of the missles.
Blowing of the titaniam armor on it. He had shot out
the other ones. He pulled his long sword and landed
infrom of Hell beast. "Hello."
  Proto1000:
 Ive been on a ling journey. I have finaly returned.
Ive been under here since the death of Galvatron. It
was lonely." He pulled out a plasma gun from his back
and shot it at Rampage as he remored his legs onto the
ground.
--- JP3884@... wrote:
>        Marine was soaked and steaming from the Acid
> shot out by Iron Raptor.
